snippet: A brief exchange in the subway led to a 4 a.m. attack on a woman from North Carolina, the authorities said.
abstract: New York City police believe that tourist from North Carolina who was raped at a Howard Johnson Express Inn in the Bronx was followed by her attacker from the Union Square subway stop in Manhattan.

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and RANDY LEONARD

lead_paragraph: A brief exchange in the subway led to a 4 a.m. attack on a woman from North Carolina, the authorities said.

headline.seo: Rapist Followed Tourist to Hotel From Subway, Police Say
headline.main: Rapist Trailed Tourist From Union Sq. Station to Her Bronx Hotel, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Rapist Trailed Tourist From Union Sq. Station to Her Bronx Hotel, Police Say
